no_code_text: do you have a discount code?
orders_text: see your previous and processing orders here.
admin_tools_text: create reports, see analytics, manage accounts and products etc.
settings_text: set notifications, language, theme and chat settings.
help_text: need support or help? This is the place.
account_text: set addresses and payment methods. See your last orders and items favorites.
address_text: set your address where we can send you our products.
new_address_text: find your addresses saved and create new to deliver products
new_payment_method_text: here you can find your payment methods to products
owner_text: name owner is printed in card
alias: a name that you can identify faster each card
cash_text: you can pay in the delivery too
branch_offices_text: find a branch office near of you.
faq_text_link: have you seen our frequently question asked section?
payment_text: here you can find your payment methods
about_us_text: all info about us and our success factory.
contact_us_text: hey! talk with us, you have doubts, recommendations or complaints? will be a pleasure to hear you.
how_to_use_text: a guide to understand app functionality
faq_text: frequently asked questions about our company and products.
notice_of_privacy_text: see our notice of privacy and use of this application.
language_text: if you want you could change this option.
currency_text: currency that appears by default is dollar, but if you want you could change this option.
theme_text: change the look of the app or let your smartphone theme choose for you.
status_text: your friends and contacts will see if you're active or your last connection time, at least you deactivate active status. You cannot see status of your friends if you deactivate it.
black_list_text: if you have contact blocked you can see here.
download_files_text: if deactivate this option files doesn't download without your permission.
need_account: you will need an account to continue. Please sign in or sign up if you don't have one.
log_in_text: please use your login information to be able to send you our products and you can enjoy them.
sign_up_title: welcome to create a new account
sign_up_text: please use a real cellphone. We'll send a confirmation code.
forget_pass_text: don't worry, we will send you a SMS with instructions for get a new password.
insert_code_text: we need to confirm that you are who you say you are.
choose_pass: great!, now you can choose a new password
personal_data_text: your personal data is confidential. We need it for identification use.
account_data_text: the data will be use for use our app, please fill fields to finish your register.
custom_item_text: here you can choose that flavors and colors you want to taste.
ask_first_option_text: we have fruit, cream, milk and alcohol flavors.
ask_second_option_text: we have fruit, cream, milk and alcohol flavors.
ask_last_option_text: we have fruit, cream, milk and alcohol flavors.
purchase_summary_text: you've choose your custom ice-cream with next flavors...
choose_address: select where would like we deliver you our products
